verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֩ <WH7925> rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> and they removed מֵֽהַשִּׁטִּ֗ים <WH7851> from Shittim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> to Jordan ה֖וּא <WH1931> and he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> he and all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיָּלִ֥נוּ <WH3885> and lodged שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there טֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> before יַעֲבֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> there before they passed over

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> And it came to pass after שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> went הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> that the officers בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> through הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the host

וַיְצַוּוּ֮ <WH6680> And they commanded אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> the people לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying כִּרְאֽוֹתְכֶ֗ם <WH7200> When ye see אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites נֹשְׂאִ֖ים <WH5375> bearing אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you תִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> it then ye shall remove מִמְּק֣וֹמְכֶ֔ם <WH4725> from your place וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֖ם <WH1980> and go אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH389> shall be a רָח֣וֹק <WH7350> Yet there shall be a space יִהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> become בֵּֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH996> among [וּבֵינֹו כ] (וּבֵינָ֔יו <WH996> among ק) כְּאַלְפַּ֥יִם <WH505> between you and it about two thousand אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits בַּמִּדָּ֑ה <WH4060> by measure אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּקְרְב֣וּ <WH7126> come not near אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> because of אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תֵּֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> unto it that ye may know אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> shall go בָ֔הּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֧א <WH3808> have not עֲבַרְתֶּ֛ם <WH5674> for ye have not passed בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> [this] way מִתְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> before that time ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> unto the people הִתְקַדָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6942> Sanctify כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מָחָ֗ר <WH4279> yourselves for to morrow יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> will do יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֖ם <WH7130> among נִפְלָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6381> wonders

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> unto the priests לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> Take up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant וְעִבְר֖וּ <WH5674> and pass over לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> And they took up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> This day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> This אָחֵל֙ <WH2490> will I begin גַּדֶּלְךָ֔ <WH1431> to magnify בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> thee in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of all Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> they יֵֽדְע֔וּן <WH3045> that they may know כִּ֗י <WH3588> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> have been עִם־ <WH5973> with מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> that as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have been עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תְּצַוֶּה֙ <WH6680> And thou shalt command אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <WH5375> that bear אֲרֽוֹן־ <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> of the covenant לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כְּבֹאֲכֶ֗ם <WH935> When ye are come עַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵה֙ <WH7097> to the brink מֵ֣י <WH4325> of the water הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan בַּיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> in Jordan תַּעֲמֹֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> ye shall stand still פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel גֹּ֣שׁוּ <WH5066> Come hither הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here וְשִׁמְע֕וּ <WH8085> and hear אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> the words יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בְּזֹאת֙ <WH2063> you תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <WH3045> Hereby ye shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ל <WH410> God חַ֖י <WH2416> that the living בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> [is] among וְהוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH3423> you and [that] he will without fail יוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> drive out מִ֠פְּנֵיכֶם <WH6440> from before אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <WH3669> you the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחִתִּ֜י <WH2850> and the Hittites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחִוִּ֗י <WH2340> and the Hivites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּרִזִּי֙ <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <WH1622> and the Girgashites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusites

הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> Behold the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֲד֖וֹן <WH136> of the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> passeth over לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before בַּיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> you into Jordan

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now קְח֤וּ <WH3947> Now therefore take לָכֶם֙ שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men מִשִּׁבְטֵ֖י <WH7626> out of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> out of every אִישׁ־ <WH376> men אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one לַשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribe

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> shall come כְּנ֣וֹחַ <WH5117> shall rest כַּפּ֣וֹת <WH3709> And it shall come to pass as soon as the soles רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> of the feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵי֩ <WH5375> that bear אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲד֤וֹן <WH136> the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of all the earth בְּמֵ֣י <WH4325> in the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan מֵ֤י <WH4325> [that] the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> of Jordan יִכָּ֣רֵת֔וּן <WH3772> shall be cut off הַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> [from] the waters הַיֹּרְדִ֖ים <WH3381> that come down מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> from above וְיַעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and they shall stand נֵ֥ד <WH5067> heap אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> upon an

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become בִּנְסֹ֤עַ <WH5265> removed הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And it came to pass when the people מֵאָ֣הֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH168> from their tents לַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> to pass over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> and the priests נֹֽשְׂאֵ֛י <WH5375> bearing הָאָר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> of the covenant לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וּכְב֞וֹא <WH935> were come נֹשְׂאֵ֤י <WH5375> And as they that bare הָֽאָרוֹן֙ <WH727> the ark עַד־ <WH5704> into הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> unto Jordan וְרַגְלֵ֤י <WH7272> and the feet הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <WH5375> that bare הָֽאָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark נִטְבְּל֖וּ <WH2881> were dipped בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> in the brim הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of the water וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> (for Jordan מָלֵא֙ <WH4390> overfloweth עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּדוֹתָ֔יו <WH1415> all his banks כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the time קָצִֽיר׃ <WH7105> bough

וַיַּעַמְד֡וּ <WH5975> stood הַמַּיִם֩ <WH4325> That the waters הַיֹּרְדִ֨ים <WH3381> which came down מִלְמַ֜עְלָה <WH4605> from above קָ֣מוּ <WH6965> [and] rose up נֵד־ <WH5067> heap אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> upon an הַרְחֵ֨ק <WH7368> far מְאֹ֜ד <WH3966> very [בָאָדָם כ] (מֵֽאָדָ֤ם <WH121> Adam ק) הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> from the city אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> is מִצַּ֣ד <WH6654> that [is] beside צָֽרְתָ֔ן <WH6891> Zaretan וְהַיֹּרְדִ֗ים <WH3381> and those that came down עַ֣ל <WH5921> toward יָ֧ם <WH3220> toward the sea הָעֲרָבָ֛ה <WH6160> of the plain יָם־ <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <WH4417> [even] the salt תַּ֣מּוּ <WH8552> failed נִכְרָ֑תוּ <WH3772> [and] were cut off וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and the people עָבְר֖וּ <WH5674> passed over נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> opposite יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> right against Jericho

וַיַּעַמְד֣וּ <WH5975> stood הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> And the priests נֹ֠שְׂאֵי <WH5375> that bare הָאָר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֶּחָֽרָבָ֛ה <WH2724> on dry ground בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> of Jordan הָכֵ֑ן <WH3559> firm וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> and all the Israelites עֹֽבְרִים֙ <WH5674> passed over בֶּחָ֣רָבָ֔ה <WH2724> on dry ground עַ֤ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תַּ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8552> clean כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> until all the people לַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan
